name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Dynamic Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in full-stack development, focusing on high-performance solutions in challenging sectors. Proficient in **Java**, **Kotlin**, **Scala**, **Python**, **TypeScript**, **React**, and backend frameworks such as **Spring Boot**. I excel in cloud environments like **AWS** and have hands-on expertise in containerization and orchestration using **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and infrastructure as code with **Terraform**.

I have a proven track record of leading development for scalable platforms and implementing CI/CD pipelines with tools like **Jenkins**, **Spinnaker**, and monitoring solutions such as **Datadog**. My experience includes working with event-driven architectures and messaging systems using **Kafka**, reinforcing modern software development practices such as Agile and SDLC. 

With a solid understanding of design patterns and strong communication skills, I excel in collaborative team environments and value constructive feedback to enhance project outcomes. I am committed to delivering secure, compliant applications and actively contribute to the refinement of agile methodologies.
